author: Lon.TV
description:
Find 8BitDo controllers on Amazon: https://lon.tv/2bca4 (compensated affiliate link) - 8BitDo released a firmware update the other day that brings compatibility with Switch 2 for a number of their more recent controllers. See more 8bitdo: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIt2qhI5w4F0TJj9zOkXKABa and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

title: 8BitDo Controllers on Switch 2? Let's Test!
